@Jason KY. are you close to being able to prove this?
I think this is doable (we are missing a few definitions I believe) but I don't think it's smart to start to prove this if there is going to be a refactor in this region of the library.
Now that I reminded myself of the version of the proof I learnt, all we need is #5814 and then the complex version is immediate and the real should be simple as well with some work
